name: Jerk Fish
keywords: jamaican jerk sauce, onion, red snapper, main course
recipeIngredient: 1 medium-size onion, peeled and coarsely chopped
4 baby red snappers, 3/4 to 1 pound each, cleaned, scaled, rinsed and patted dry

recipeInstructions.text: In a blender or food processor combine jerk sauce, water, onion, thyme, scallion, pepper and sherry, if desired, and puree until smooth. Pour the mixture into a glass or ceramic baking dish. Place fish in the marinade and coat well. Refrigerate for 2 hours.
Prepare grill. Remove fish from marinade and pat dry. Grill 5 to 8 minutes on each side, until fish flakes easily with a fork. Serve with rice and additional jerk sauce, to taste.
